metadata.title: CVE-2024-53134 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  pmdomain: imx93-blk-ctrl: correct remove path  The check condition should be 'i < bc->onecell_data.num_domains', not 'bc->onecell_data.num_domains' which will make the look never finish and cause kernel panic.  Also disable runtime to address "imx93-blk-ctrl 4ac10000.system-controller: Unbalanced pm_runtime_enable!"
